description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

v2.1.description:
This is the split off from the classic CTR manual. 
Feature inclusions have all sngle race tracks, time trial, and cups.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/commits/v2.1
v2.1.title: Manual CTR:NF v2.1

v2.2.description:
Fixed an issue keeping it from generating.

## What's Changed
* Fixed generation issue by @Hallstead in https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/pull/2


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v2.1...v2.2
v2.2.title: Manual CTR:NF v2.2

v2.3.description:
Reorganized how location categories are displayed.
Also removed a few yaml options that either dont do anything at the momet or are required to be on.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/commits/v2.3
v2.3.title: Manual CTR:NF v2.3

v2.5.description:
Made it so Single races is no longer required to be on.
The Gather Trophies location(s) now unlocks one final track or cup to beat before Victory.
Cups now require only a cup unlock item similar to track unlock items.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v2.2...v2.5
v2.5.title: Manual CTR:NF v2.5

v2.6.description:
Added an option to select the number of starting locations.

Fixed a bug where Classic was required to be on to generate.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v2.5...v2.6
v2.6.title: Manual CTR:NF v2.6

v3.0.description:
This release features Chunk unlock progression, allowing Tracks to be unlocked in groups rather than individually.

Other changes include a rework of the way Locations are processed for personal convenience.

## What's Changed
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v2.6...v3.0
v3.0.title: Manual CTR:NF v3.0

v3.1.description:
Chunks are now properly implemented, but Time Trial now has issues generating.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v2.6...v3.1
v3.1.title: Manual CTR:NF v3.1

v3.2.description:
This release features the addition of Chunk unlocks. In this mode, tracks are unlocked in groups at a time, and after so many trophies are received it unlocks a Cup. Beating the Cup unlocks the next group of tracks.

Time Trial is properly working now.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v2.6...v3.2
v3.2.title: Manual CTR:NF v3.2

v4.1.description:
Cup unlock method option.
Final challenge is optional.
Fixed a bug with cup items being disabled when they should have been enabled.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v4.0...v4.1
v4.1.title: Manual CTR:NF v4.1

v4.2.description:
Random Characters and Driving Styles have been implemented.
Updated location names to Top 5/3 instead of 5th/3rd.

Fixed a bug with the way cup requires are evaluated on four track unlock method.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v4.1...v4.2
v4.2.title: Manual CTR:NF v4.2

v4.3.description:
Time Trial now has Progressive Ghost items instead of individual ghosts, aside from N. Tropy ghost when it is the only ghost.
Tracks now have added categories for what cup(s) they are in to make hinting them easier.

Fixed a bug where the Nitros Oxide Edition characters were always being removed from the pool, which caused occasional generation issues when they were chosen as the starting character.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v4.2...v4.3
v4.3.title: Manual CTR:NF v4.3

v4.4.description:
Starting Tracks are now pre-collected/given at start (excludong in Chunks mode).
The gather trophy locations are now victory locations in Trophy Hunt mode.
N. Tropy ans N. Tropy Loc. categories to N. Tropy Item and N. Tropy.

A visual glitch has been observed where a random track will only show Hard 1st place in logic. This seemingly only happens on Final Challenge with all difficulties enabled.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v4.3...v4.4
v4.4.title: Manual CTR:NF v4.4

v4.4.1.description: Fixed the issue with Universal Tracker showing some locations as inaccessible when they should be.
v4.4.1.title: Manual CTR:NF v4.4 Hotfix

v4.5.description: Classic CTR has been merged with CTR:NF. The two games are setup to be able to select which game you are playing. For ease of use, separate yamls with relevant settings are provided below.
v4.5.title: Manual CTR and CTR:NF v4.5

v4.5.1.description:
Added tags to tracks and cups to make prioritization easier.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v4.5...v4.5.1
v4.5.1.title: Manual CTR and CTR:NF v4.5.1

v5.0.description:
Updated to Manual stable client 20241119.

Also fixed a bug where Turbo Track Ghosts still appeared when Turbo Track was not included.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v4.5.1...v5.0
v5.0.title: Manual CTR and CTR:NF v5.0

v5.1.description:
What's Changed
Fixed options visibility bug caused by change made in AP v 0.6.0

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v5.0...v5.1
v5.1.title: Manual CTR and CTR:NF v5.1

v5.2.description:
This release fixes a bug relating to trophy requirements when using timetrial with chunks.
I also cleaned up the code a little.

Still to do:
Update to latest stable of Manual
v5.2.title: Manual CTR and CTR:NF v5.2

v6.0.description:
Updated to latest Manual Stable version 20250714

## What's Changed
* Update to latest stable version by @Hallstead in https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/pull/29


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v5.2...v6.0
v6.0.title: Manual CTR and CTR:NF v6.0

v6.1.description:
Battles are here!
Presently, it's all or nothing for the different battle modes, but users should be able to choose which modes they want in the next update.
Battles are an NF-only option, as Classic CTR does not support battles against a CPU.

## What's Changed
* Battles and fixed trophy logic by @Hallstead in https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/pull/30


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v6.0...v6.1
v6.1.title: Manual CTR and CTR:NF v6.1

v6.2r2.description:
This one has some fun (in my opinion) things coming through.
- Battles have been fixed to work with Final Challenge and Chunks.
- The yaml has been switched to use the new options.json file for template generation, and options have been rearranged into new groups.
- In the Manual Client, item categories that don't have any items in the seed are now hidden.

If you find anything amiss, let me know.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v6.1...v6.2
v6.2r2.title: Manual CTR and CTR:NF v6.2

v6.3.1.description:
Updated to latest Maunal Stable 20250813, with necessity for AP version 6.3

Also, I modified the version number to state what version of AP it is meant for now.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v6.2...v6.3.1
v6.3.1.title: Manual CTR and CTR:NF v6.3.1

v6.3.1.1.description: Fixed a bug where setting random characters in Classic CTR caused a generation failure.
v6.3.1.1.title: Manual CTR and CTR:NF v6.3.1 Hotfix

v6.3.2r2.description:
Somewhat of a larger update on this one.
- Chunks are no longer an option. (Logic for everything was just getting too difficult to keep it in as an option)
- Locations have been added for winning races or battles as a specific character or driving style, depending on what you are randomizing.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes and code optimizations.

## What's Changed
* Removed the need to define excess trophies then remove them. by @Hallstead in https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/pull/34
* Removed Chunks by @Hallstead in https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/pull/35
* Updated code to be a little more elegant regarding the minimum number… by @Hallstead in https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/pull/36
* Staging by @Hallstead in https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/pull/37


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Hallstead/manual_crashteamracingnitrofueled_hallstead/compare/v6.3.1.1...v6.3.2
v6.3.2r2.title: Manual CTR and CTR:NF v6.3.2.1
